promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic mythical ibex normal-type pokemon wearing a opal mask. It can be found in grassland-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Opaleer, a a dynamic mythical ibex normal-type pokemon. It can be found in grassland-like environments It has the following abilities: Wonder Flash, Mischievous Tail. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "normal" or "Opaleer". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, ibex-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: This elusive, horned creature frolics in meadows, using its Wonder Flash to startle predators, and Mischievous Tail to playfully scatter flowers.
